section.p: ‘Have you heard?’ says an excited youth as he goes by. ‘The chancellor’s men have caught that villainous wizard Akugenda the Unseen. They’re going to try and execute him at Shingen, but I’ll bet he’s got a few tricks up his sleeve yet.’
‘Shingen is a long way off,’ you reply, unimpressed. ‘The news might be out of date, and Akugenda already a year in his grave.’
